name: Tank And Roll
description:
Tank And Roll is an action - shooting - score game that was developed during my first attempt at coding.
The gameplay is about a tank facing waves of enemies while leveling up and getting stronger.
The goal is to Survive for as long as you can.
There are features such as unlocking new vehicles, drawing your own vehicle, and importing custom avatars for your character!​
Tank And Roll has been fully released, but I am more than willing to create additional content and provide updates if there is sufficient interest.
The game's theme was inspired by a nostalgic habit from my school days when I used to draw with a pen on my books! :)
